news.description: As Covid vaccine roll outs help lift restrictions, many people are contemplating travel again. But as prices rise with demand, scammers are using fake air travel deals and other shady schemes to part people from their cash.

news.author: Angie Chui
news.title: Kpop-led drama ‘Imitation’ breaks record for lowest drama rating on major network
news.description: KBS2It seems that the combined power of K-pop stars U-KISS’s Jun, ATEEZ’s Yunho, SF9’s Chani were not enough to pull in the ratings of their new drama “Imitation.”The drama’s sixth episode, which aired on KBS2 last Friday night, raked in only 0.7 percent of audience rating in its first half. It got worse during its second half, which turned up an even lower rating of 0.4 percent.The episode now holds the all-time record of the lowest ever rating for a drama aired on a major broadcasting station series.“Imitation” is based on a webtoon of the same name which revolves around the...

news.title: Indonesia landslides and floods kill dozens
news.description: Multiple disasters caused by torrential rains in eastern Indonesia have killed at least 55 people and displaced thousands, the country’s disaster relief agency said Monday. More than 40 other people were missing.

news.title: Fighting COVID with COVID
news.description: What if the COVID-19 virus could be used against itself? Researchers at Penn State have designed a proof-of-concept therapeutic that may be able to do just that. The team designed a synthetic defective SARS-CoV-2 virus that is innocuous but interferes with the real virus's growth, potentially causing the extinction of both the disease-causing virus and the synthetic virus.
news.source: Phys.org - News And Articles On Science And Technology
